name: Lonsdale Maduro
additionalNotes: Aspira Maduro cigars are medium to full-bodied cigars made exclusively for Famous Smoke Shop by master blender, Nestor Plasencia. Each cigar has a rich-tasting blend of Honduran and Nicaraguan tobaccos that dovetail with a dark, semi-sweet Broadleaf Maduro wrapper for a smooth, hearty smoke.
